message.content:
We need to extract three items:

• The end value of the profit (loss) for the period before tax – that is the Income Statement’s “Profit Before Tax”.
• The addition in the amount owed for goods or services received on credit – that is the Balance Sheet’s “Accounts Payable”.
• The capital contributed by shareholders in exchange for shares – that is the Balance Sheet’s “Paid-in Capital”.

In the sample provided the values were mapped as follows:
 value1 = Paid-in Capital (from the balance sheet)
 value2 = Profit Before Tax (from the income statement)
 value3 = Accounts Payable (from the balance sheet)

For the new data, checking the input:

• In the balance sheet, “Paid-in Capital” End_amount is 13000000.00.
• In the income statement, “Profit Before Tax” is –1323824.05.
• In the balance sheet, “Accounts Payable” End_amount is 2390000.00.

Thus, our answer is:

{
  "solution": {
    "value1": "13000000.00",
    "value2": "-1323824.05",
    "value3": "2390000.00"
  }
}
